content.html: ... the podcast describes Post as a micropayment play, which requires news publishers to collaborate in a way they never have before. (Of that I'm skeptical.) Marc Andreessen, who blocks me for some reason, is a funder, as well. I am @jayrosen_nyu on Post.News 2/2
